name: Dimension Travler
description:
This is an Early Build with only a Tutorial Level
We are Working on more Stuff

It`s our first own Game Project 

In Dimension Travler you are able to switch between 2D and 3D to solve different puzzles.

[Controls]

[TAB] - Switch Dimension

[W,A,S,D] - Movement

[CREDITS]

Quarktasche/Tim (Aseprite) - Textures and Design

Marvin (Blender) - 3D Objects

NayuFX/Ben (Unity) - Code and Game Build
